data.name: Wedding Detox
data.description: Many brides want to look their best on the big day and may even go to extreme measures to do so. Before you shell out major bucks on a juice cleanse or put yourself on a deprivation diet, follow these tips and tricks on detoxing naturally before the wedding.
data.shortDescription: Many brides want to look their best on the big day and may even go to extreme measures to do so. Before you shell out major bucks on a juice cleanse or put yourself on a deprivation diet, follow these tips and tricks on detoxing naturally before the wedding.

schedule.name: Attention
schedule.description: We recommend you to consult your physician before starting any detox or diet programs
